description: A public ballot on constitutional change is postponed because of coronavirus concerns.
title: Coronavirus delays Russian vote on Putin staying in power
title_page: Coronavirus delays Russian vote on Putin staying in power - BBC News
maintext: Holding a nationwide vote in a pandemic had always seemed bad politics, at the very least. Opposition leader Alexei Navalny had even called it "criminal", especially as Russia's most faithful voters are pensioners and among the most vulnerable to the virus.
